name: ResamplerMode

  Determines the image filtering used.
description: |
  Determines the image filtering used.
codesamples: []

items:
  - name: Default
    summary: |
      Bilinear filtering of the four near pixels in the image.
    value: 0

  - name: Pixelated
    summary: |
      Nearest neighbor filtering of the closest pixel in the image.
